rationale: The segment contains 'low' but no intensifier or comparative modifying it.
statement_text: The risk of human-to-human spread of the H5N8 strain of bird flu appears low after it was identified for the first time worldwide in farm workers in Russia, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Friday.
